content.question: Considering global trends in late-nineteenth-century migration movements, the specific migrations that produced the demographic situation shown in the table most likely contributed to which of the following social or political changes in India?

choices.label: The granting of suffrage to Indian women
An increase in the number of Indian women engaging in occupations that had formerly been held by men
A decreased emphasis on the importance of marriage and child-rearing in traditional Indian culture
A decline in the use of child labor in Indian agriculture

content.answer: An increase in the number of Indian women engaging in occupations that had formerly been held by men

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
